minimo_contrasena: The password must be at least 8 characters
error_inicio_sesion: There was an error logging in
confirma_registar_resultados_prueba_tecn: Do you want to record the result of a technical test?
maximo_minimo_calificacion: The qualification must be between 0 and 10 points
error_formato_calificacion: Incorrect format, value must be numeric
maximo_observaciones: Observations can be a maximum of 500 characters
sin_equipos: The selected project has no related equipment
asignar_candidatos_confirmacion: Do you want to assign candidates to a team?
error_asignar_candidatos: There was an error in assigning candidates to a team
campos_incompletos: The form has empty required fields
sin_citas: You don't have any appointment yet
sin_notas: No results have been recorded for this interview
detalle_calificacion: The score is a value from 0 to 10 and decimal values are allowed. Ex: 5 or 3.5
evaluacion_desempenio_confirmacion: Do you want to record the candidate's performance evaluation?
evaluacion_desempenio_correctamente: The candidate's performance evaluation has been recorded correctly
error_evaluacion_desempenio: There was an error in recording the candidate's performance evaluation
sin_candidatos: The selected team has no related candidates
error_formato_texto: Incorrect format, value must be text
registrar_candidato_confirmacion: Would you like to register as a candidate?
registrar_candidato_exitoso: You have successfully registered as a candidate
registrar_candidato_fallido: There was an error when registering as a candidate
longitud_campo: The name must be a maximum of 100 characters
contraseña_representante_longitud: The representative's password must be at least 8 characters long
contraseña_representante_formato: The password must have a minimum of one capital letter and one number and one special character
actualizar_educacion_confirmacion: Do you want to update the education information?
actualizacion_educacion_correctamente: The education information has been updated correctly
actualizacion_habilidades_correctamente: Skills and languages information has been successfully updated
actualizar_habilidades_confirmacion: Do you want to register update skills and languages?
actualizacion_experiencia_correctamente: Work experience information has been successfully updated
actualizar_experiencia_confirmacion: Do you want to record work experience information?
sin_informacion: No information has been recorded yet
la_fecha_inicio_no_puede_ser_mayor_a_la_: The start date cannot be greater than the end date
error_actualizando_informacion: There was an error updating the information
error_formato_anos_experiencia: Incorrect format, value must posivite number
